BoneFists.Description: Level 2 spell for many classes, gives +1 natural armor (form-type) and +2 natural weapons damage to group

ChainsOfFire.Description: A fire damage knockoff of chain lightning.

EntropicShield.Description: Level 1 Cleric/Oracle spell, gives 20% miss chance to incoming ranged attacks

FreezingSphere.Description: Level 6 ice spherical AoE attack, has normal and supersized blast modes

GloomblindBolts.Description: Basically Negative Energy Scorching Ray with a very short duration blind rider. Is Illusion (Shadow) for some ungodly reason

KeenEdge.Description: Make your weapons Keen for a while

SpearOfPurity.Description: Arrow Of Law, only [Good] rather than [Lawful]. Level 2 divine ray spell.

TelekineticStrikes.Description: Add 1d4 force damage rider to natural weapons

FireShield.Description: Resist Fire/Cold, deal backlash damage of other element

VitrolicMist.Description: Fire Shield, but for acid damage

HealMount.Description: Cast Heal on mount only. Paladin Level 3

DiscordantSong.Description: Bard Song adds 1d6 sonic damage rider

ProdigiousTWF.Description: Use Strength For TWF Prerequisites, Ignore Heavy Offhand Weapon Penalty

SunderingStrike.Description: Perform Sunder Armor on critical hit

Ensorcelled.Description: Attempt to dispel hostile effects on the target while healing with lay on hands, or dispel buffs while using Lay on Hands offensively.

Injured.Description: Grant target fast healing 3 for one round per two paladin levels

BracersOfTheMercifulKnight.Description: Adds a set of magic bracers that improve Paladin Lay On Hands to Arsinoe's stock. Uncaps Lay On Hands healing as a side effect. I do not know what will happen if you disable this mid-game.

BracersOfTheAvengingKnight.Description: Adds a set of magic bracers that improve Paladin Smite Evil to Arsinoe's stock. Uncaps Lay On Hands healing as a side effect. I do not know what will happen if you disable this mid-game.
